titleStmt.title: Two papers of proposals concerning the discipline and ceremonies of the Church of England humbly presented to His Majesty by the Reverend ministers of the Presbyterian perswasion.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

notesStmt.note: Drawn up by Richard Baxter. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of originals in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York and the Newberry Library.
